search.title: Search
search.note: The placeholder text in a search input field.

empty_title.title: Nothing to see here!
empty_title.note: Text shown where there are no remaining history entries

empty_text.title: No results
empty_text.note: Placeholder text when there's no results to show

no_results_title.title: No results found for {term}
no_results_title.note: The placeholder {term} will be dynamically replaced with the search term entered by the user. For example, if the user searches for 'cats', the title will become 'No results found for cats'.

no_results_text.title: Try searching for a different keyword.
no_results_text.note: Placeholder text when a search gave no results.

status_on.title: On
status_on.note: Option indicating that the default browser setting is turned on

status_on_private.title: Always On
status_on_private.note: Option indicating that a setting is 'always on' meaning the use cannot configure it

status_off.title: Off
status_off.note: Option indicating that the default browser setting is turned off

webTrackingProtection.screenTitle.title: Web Tracking Protection
webTrackingProtection.screenTitle.note: Heading for the web tracking protection settings section

webTrackingProtection.ddg_tracking_info.title: DuckDuckGo automatically blocks hidden trackers as you browse the web.
webTrackingProtection.ddg_tracking_info.note: Informational text explaining how DuckDuckGo protects against trackers

webTrackingProtection.learn_more_trackin.title: Learn More
webTrackingProtection.learn_more_trackin.note: Link text for additional information about tracking protection

webTrackingProtection.gpc.global_privacy.title: Enable Global Privacy Control
webTrackingProtection.gpc.global_privacy.note: Checkbox option for enabling the Global Privacy Control feature

webTrackingProtection.gpc.global_privacy.title: Tells participating websites not to sell or share your data.
webTrackingProtection.gpc.global_privacy.note: Explanation of what the Global Privacy Control feature does

webTrackingProtection.gpc.learn_more_gpc.title: Learn More
webTrackingProtection.gpc.learn_more_gpc.note: Link text for additional information about Global Privacy Control

privateSearch.screenTitle.title: Private Search
privateSearch.screenTitle.note: Heading for the private search settings section

privateSearch.ddg_private_search_info.title: DuckDuckGo Private Search is your default search engine, so you can search the web without being tracked.
privateSearch.ddg_private_search_info.note: Informational text explaining the privacy benefit of using DuckDuckGo as the default search engine

privateSearch.learn_more_link.title: Learn More
privateSearch.learn_more_link.note: Link text for additional information about private search

privateSearch.autocomplete_opt.title: Autocomplete suggestions
privateSearch.autocomplete_opt.note: Checkbox option for enabling autocomplete suggestions in search

defaultBrowser.screenTitle.title: Default Browser
defaultBrowser.screenTitle.note: Heading for the default browser settings section

defaultBrowser.off_opt.title: Off
defaultBrowser.off_opt.note: Option indicating that the default browser setting is turned off

defaultBrowser.ddg_not_default.title: DuckDuckGo is not your default browser.
defaultBrowser.ddg_not_default.note: Notification message indicating that DuckDuckGo is not set as the default browser

defaultBrowser.ddg_is_default.title: DuckDuckGo is your default browser.
defaultBrowser.ddg_is_default.note: Notification message indicating that DuckDuckGo is not set as the default browser

defaultBrowser.make_ddg_default.title: Make DuckDuckGo Default...
defaultBrowser.make_ddg_default.note: Button text to set DuckDuckGo as the default browser

defaultBrowser.shortcuts_head.title: Shortcuts
defaultBrowser.shortcuts_head.note: Heading for the shortcuts settings section

defaultBrowser.ddg_not_in_dock.title: DuckDuckGo is not added to the Dock.
defaultBrowser.ddg_not_in_dock.note: Notification message indicating that DuckDuckGo is not added to the Dock

defaultBrowser.ddg_is_in_dock.title: DuckDuckGo is added to the Dock.
defaultBrowser.ddg_is_in_dock.note: Notification message indicating that DuckDuckGo is not added to the Dock

defaultBrowser.add_to_dock.title: Add to Dock...
defaultBrowser.add_to_dock.note: Button text to add DuckDuckGo to the Dock

cookiePopupProtection.screenTitle.title: Cookie Pop-Up Protection
cookiePopupProtection.screenTitle.note: Heading for the cookie pop-up protection settings section

cookiePopupProtection.ddg_cookie_info.title: DuckDuckGo will try to select the most private settings available and hide these pop-ups for you.
cookiePopupProtection.ddg_cookie_info.note: Informational text explaining how DuckDuckGo handles cookie consent pop-ups

cookiePopupProtection.learn_more_link.title: Learn More
cookiePopupProtection.learn_more_link.note: Link text for additional information about cookie pop-up protection

cookiePopupProtection.auto_handle_cookie.title: Automatically handle cookie pop-ups
cookiePopupProtection.auto_handle_cookie.note: Checkbox option for enabling automatic handling of cookie consent pop-ups
